Reviews.Content: travel seattle frequently business stayed downtown properties westin sheraton hilton crowne plaza kimpton properties etc found favorite hotel downtown seattle hyatt olive 8 decor elegant calm spacious wellappointed particularly oversized sliding doors closet shower upscale feel compared regular doors glasswalled walkin shower nice plus personally designed dual shower heads bed comfortable wireless internet service free fast reliable service hotel excellent wake calls humans machines optional 10minute followup call morning accidentally left phone hook call hotel sent knock door awake thats customer service gym spotless outfitted plenty quality equipment including treadmills ellipticals stationary bikes complete set weight stations pieces aerobic equipment individual television screens course hyatt hotels condos attached quality gyms exception stunning view fitness center sheraton perfect close swimmers theres 65 foot saline lap pool real treat havent found downtown property theres complete day spa property sample trip breakfast urbane waiter morning spoiled bringing steamed milk coffee id trek toulouse petite queen anne pain perdu time marred stay hyatt olive 8 loud bunch kids partying door wee hours morning loud walls thin hear word 130 am finally called front desk offered send hotel security quiet party half hour floor

Reviews.Title: “Olive 8 is worth considering for your trip to Seattle”

Reviews.Content: ive visited seattle business 2530 times past stayed various hotels hotel outside seattle called hotel favorite time husband baby people award trip stay comfertable delivered babys crib cute little toiletries stayed corner cant noise people liked concept key switch controlled card times forget lights leaving liked shower door found shower head pressure water annoying corner looking someones office weekend wasnt deal def stay beautiful hotel service beat location walking distance shopping pikes close attractions seattle wouldnt reccomend eating restaurant food average seattle restaurants try instead eating parking expensive charge internet access

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel but beware the parking charge”
Reviews.Author: Crossmichael
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hyatt attending northwest garden washington convention centre short blocks expect excellent service item bill found bit top 39 cost parking realise parking downtown seattle cheap 39 included 6 taxes found bit excessive appears growing trend hotels rates competitive recoup costs parking charges plus late evening requested food menu resturant staff prepared reasonable price kudos staff hotel excellent rating aware cost parking

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”

Reviews.Content: stayed weekend overall hotel friendly staff clean spacious modern nice happy hour hotel bar pool hot tub equipped locker extra amenities unbelievable fitness center art equipment fresh towls water hotel walking distance shopping restaurants pike 1015 min walk highly recommend hotel 5 stars
